reviewText: My grandson plays this over and over and over...  Grandma was happy with the fast shipping and good packaging but what was I thinking? LOL!  Good episodes and no hocus-pocus if you are sensitive about that stuff.
our whole family loves scoody doo and we are trying to get all the dvds made of him...this is such a neat dvd and the cats love him too.  thanks
he wathces this over and over again so if you have a scooby nut this is worth it
I agree...why do they keep releasing duplicate episodes?  I really want them to release all the original Scrappy episodes as well as the ones with Scooby Dumb and Scooby Dee etc.

Get more for your money, you can get these four episodes PLUS 10 more for just a few dollars more in the "WHAT'S NEW SCOOBY DOO SEASON 1" set!

2002 season

Oct. 26  It's Mean, It's Grean, It's the Mystery Machine!

Nov. 02  Riva Ras Vegas

Nov. 09  Roller Ghoster Ride

Nov. 23  Safari So Goodie

Call me old fashioned, but I prefer the original Scooby Doos.  These new ones just get a little scary for little ones and are a little too dark.  I don't like that the "monster" is not always a person in a costume like in the originals. I know it is only a cartoon, but I don't think some of this content is good for very young children.  My 8 year old loves this, my 6 and 3 year olds are frightened by it and won't be in the same room when it is on.

It's Mean, It's Green, It's the Mystery Machine

Riva Ras Rega

Safari, So Good!

The what's new scooby doo does justice to the originals. My daughter is 2 and loves scooby. Some of the movies made between the orginials and these were not so great. If you love scooby as well,the whole series of What's New Scooby Doo is a must
There were no stickers included in the book as advertised
Kids always liked this one and had to replace our lost dvd.
Got this for my son as a gift. He loves it and it arrived on time.
Scooby Doo is one of my favorite cartoons, and I love the compilation this has.
Love Scooby doo. Great and fast shipping as always!!!
Another great scooby Doo movie!! The kids loved it.
awesome price  it for ever for them to mail it out.
I love it. I had this DVD a long time ago but some how it lost it I'm happy that I now have it again
